## Row {height=30%}

### Column {width=60%}


::: {.card}
**Visualization Features**

This dashboard presents a visual representation of the Phytase (1DKP) crystal structure  bound to it's phytate ligand (IHP). The scatter plot represents the alpha-carbon and ligand atom locations in 3-dimensional space. 

- **Gray markers**: All protein residues
- **Green markers**: Residues within 7Å of the ligand
- **Purple markers**: IHP ligand atoms

:::
